power.title: Burning Weapons
power.fluff: Flames dance across the weapons that you and comrades wield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you and any ally within 2 squares of you deals extra fire damage with Weapon or Fire attacks. The extra damage equals your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
You add the bonus from the effect to this damage roll.

power.title: Drain Speed
power.fluff: You bind the quickness of your enemy to the enchantments you placed on your ally, transferring speed from one to the other

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy, and one ally within 5 squares of the enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target ally gains 5 temporary hit points.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target enemy is slowed. As long as the enemy is slowed, the target ally gains a +2 power bonus speed.

power.title: Halo of Thorns
power.fluff: You enchant your ammunition with poisoning magic, then transfer that enchantment on one of your allies close to the target

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier poison damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one ally within 5 squares of the target. Until the end of your next turn, any creature that hits that ally with a melee attack takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Ice Shard Traps
power.fluff: You spread invisible patches of ice on the battlefield, creating traps that erupt into a hail of crystals when enemies stumble into them

section.name: Target:
section.text: Two unoccupied squares in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an ice shard trap in each target square until the end of your next turn. The traps do not occupy their space and are invisible to your enemies.
You can use the Shard Blast attack, using a shard trap as the origin square.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: Any remaining traps persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can take 5 minutes to use this power. If you do, you target five squares instead of two, and the traps lasts for 1 hour or until you recover this power.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature enter's the ice shard trap's square

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes cold damage equal to your 2 + Intelligence modifier, and is covered in icy crystals until the end of its next turn.
While covered, the target has vulnerable 5 cold, and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: The ice shard trap is destroyed after this attack has been resolved.

power.title: Scouring Weapon
power.fluff: You infuse your weapon with acid, momentarily corroding your opponent's defense

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: One-half the penalty to AC.

power.title: Shielding Cube
power.fluff: You direct a minute cube covered in runes into the fray, and though the cube is small, it contains the force that bashes foes and shields allies

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 2 squares from the burst's origin square.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target 1 square from the burst's origin square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create a zone of protective force in the burst until the end of your next turn.
You and each ally in the zone gain a power bonus to AC. The bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

power.title: Spike Wire
power.fluff: You create a bundle of barbed wire that bites into your enemy's flesh, digging deeper and deeper

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes additional damage each time it is hit. The additional damage equals your Wisdom modifier when the target is hit with a Weapon attack (or other physical attack at the DM's discretion) or half this amount otherwise.

power.title: Weakening Frost
power.fluff: The strike of your frost-covered weapon makes your foe weak for a moment

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is weakened for the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn.
